verses.verse: <S%H3117>Behold,<s%> a day of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> when your <S%H7998>spoil<s%> will be <S%H2505>divided<s%> in your <S%H7130>midst.<s%>

For I will <S%H622>gather<s%> all <S%H1471>nations<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H4421>battle;<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> will be <S%H3920>taken,<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H8155>rifled,<s%> and the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H7901>ravished.<s%> <S%H2677>Half<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> will go <S%H3318>out<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> and the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> will not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will go <S%H3318>out<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against those <S%H1471>nations,<s%> as <S%H3117>when<s%> he <S%H3898>fought<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>battle.<s%>

His <S%H7272>feet<s%> will <S%H5975>stand<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> on the <S%H2022>Mount<s%> of <S%H2132>Olives,<s%> which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> on the <S%H6924>east;<s%> and the <S%H2022>Mount<s%> of <S%H2132>Olives<s%> will be <S%H1234>split<s%> in <S%H2677>two,<s%> from <S%H4217>east<s%> to <S%H3220>west,<s%> making a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1516>valley.<s%> <S%H2677>Half<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> will <S%H4185>move<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of it toward the <S%H5045>south.<s%>

You shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> by the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of my <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> for the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall <S%H5060>reach<s%> to <S%H682>Azel;<s%> <S%H5127>yes,<s%> you shall flee, just like you <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7494>earthquake<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>come,<s%> and all the holy ones with <S%H6918>you.<s%>
It will happen in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that there will not be <S%H216>light,<s%> <S%H3368>cold,<s%> or <S%H7087>frost.<s%>

It will be a <S%H259>unique<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> which is <S%H3045>known<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> not <S%H3117>day,<s%> and not <S%H3915>night;<s%> but it will come to <S%H6153>pass,<s%> that at evening <S%H6256>time<s%> there will be <S%H216>light.<s%>

It will happen in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> will go <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of them toward the <S%H6931>eastern<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of them toward the <S%H314>western<s%> <S%H3220>sea;<s%> in <S%H7019>summer<s%> and in winter will it <S%H2779>be.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will be <S%H4428>King<s%> over all the <S%H776>earth.<s%> In that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will be <S%H259>one,<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

All the <S%H776>land<s%> will be made like the <S%H6160>Arabah,<s%> from <S%H1387>Geba<s%> to <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%> <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and she will be lifted <S%H7213>up,<s%> and will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in her <S%H4725>place,<s%> from <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>'s <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> to the <S%H6434>corner<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and from the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H2606>Hananel<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3342>winepresses.<s%>
Men will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H2764>therein,<s%> and there will be no more curse; but <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely.<s%>

This will be the <S%H4046>plague<s%> with which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5062>strike<s%> all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> who have <S%H6633>warred<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> will consume <S%H4743>away<s%> while they <S%H5975>stand<s%> on their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> will consume <S%H4743>away<s%> in their <S%H2356>sockets,<s%> and their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> will consume <S%H4743>away<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

It will happen in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4103>panic<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will be among <S%H2388>them;<s%> and they will lay hold <S%H376>everyone<s%> on the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> will rise <S%H5927>up<s%> against the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> also will <S%H3898>fight<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and the <S%H2428>wealth<s%> of all the <S%H5439>surrounding<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> will be gathered <S%H622>together:<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H899>clothing,<s%> in <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7230>abundance.<s%>

So will be the <S%H4046>plague<s%> of the <S%H5483>horse,<s%> of the <S%H6505>mule,<s%> of the <S%H1581>camel,<s%> and of the <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and of all the <S%H929>animals<s%> that will be in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H4264>camps,<s%> as that <S%H4046>plague.<s%>

It will happen that everyone who is <S%H3498>left<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> will go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H1767>from<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> and to <S%H2287>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tents.<s%>

It will <S%H4940>be,<s%> that whoever of all the families of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H5927>doesn't<s%> go up to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> on them there will be no <S%H1653>rain.<s%>

If the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5927>doesn't<s%> go up, and <S%H935>doesn't<s%> come, neither will it rain on <S%H4046>them.<s%> This will be the plague with which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5062>strike<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H5927>don't<s%> go up to <S%H2287>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tents.<s%>

This will be the <S%H2403>punishment<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H2403>punishment<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H5927>don't<s%> go up to <S%H2287>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tents.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> there will be on the <S%H4698>bells<s%> of the <S%H5483>horses,<s%> <S%H6944>"HOLY<s%> TO <S%H3068>YAHWEH;<s%>" and the <S%H5518>pots<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> will be like the <S%H4219>bowls<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

<S%H5518>Yes,<s%> every pot in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies;<s%> and all those who <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> of <S%H1310>them,<s%> and cook in <S%H3117>them.<s%> In that day there will no longer be a <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>
